meanings.sent1: The picture was redrawn with brighter colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist redrew the sketch to make it more detailed.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully redrew the same circle over and over.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a redrawn rainbow after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The map was redrawn with clearer lines for better navigation.

meanings.sent1: She redrew the flower to make it more symmetrical.
meanings.sent2: The architect redraws the building plans to include more rooms.
meanings.sent3: The students redrew their doodles on the chalkboard.
meanings.sent4: His life was like a story constantly being redrawn with new chapters.
meanings.sent5: The boundaries of the kingdom were redrawn after the war.
